IAUED accepts NCEcredit inMathematics and another

    (ii)  AAUA accepts   
    (a)  upper credit Diploma in Computer Science, Statistics 
or Electronic/ Electrical Engineering from any 
recognized Institutions.  
    (b)  passes in two (2) ‘A’ Level subjects which must include 
Mathematics.  
    (c)  NCE credit pass in Mathematics, Computer Science and 
any other Science or Social Science subject.  
      
UTME  
(i) BENIN requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes including 
English Language, Mathematics and two (2) other 
Science or Social Sciences subjects.  
(ii) AAUA requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics Physics Chemistry and 
Biology.  
(iii) IAUED requires five(5)‘O’ level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics and any other three  
(3) subjects from Further Ma thematics, Physics, 
Chemistry, Biology and Agricultural Science  
(iv) UNN requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics or Physics, plus three (3) 
Science or Social Sciences subjects.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) UNN requires Mathematics or Ph ysicsand two 
(2)other Sciencesubjects.  
(ii) BENIN requires Mathematics, Physics and any other 
Science or Social Sciences subjects.  
(iii) IAUED requires Mathematics and any two (2) of 
Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Geography and 
Economics in order of preference.
